  • Packages that use RequestCookie 
    Package Description
    com.hotels.styx.api
    A programming interface for Styx extensions.

      Constructs a cookie with a name, value and attributes.
      Methods in com.hotels.styx.api that return types with arguments of type RequestCookie 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<RequestCookie> HttpRequest.cookie(String name)
      Decodes the "Cookie" header in this request and returns the specified cookie.

      Decodes the "Cookie" header in this request and returns the specified cookie.

      Decodes the "Cookie" header in this request and returns the cookies.
      Set<RequestCookie> FullHttpRequest.cookies()
      Decodes the "Cookie" header in this request and returns the cookies.
      static Set<RequestCookie> RequestCookie.decode(String headerValue)
      Decodes a "Cookie" header value into a set of RequestCookie objects.
